alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 10:58AM CDT until September 01 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Jackson affecting Hinds and Rankin Counties. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Jackson. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 31.0 feet. - Forecast...River stages above Ross Barnett continue to fall which is allowing the reservoir to continue to cut back discharges. The river is expected to fall below flood stage early in the morning and will continue falling to 13.2 feet by Monday morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Pearl River Jackson 28.0 31.0 Wed 10 am CD 25.9 19.1 15.3 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CDT.
